name: the Legacy of the Gnarshok
description:
The young archaeologist Mawat tries to find out what kind of message the old Gnarshok left behind on the ancient artifacts. Is it an ancient treasure or is it a warning?

The Legacy of the Gnarshok is a short bitsy game I originally made for my Storytelling class. It was based on my thesis about Environmental Storytelling, but it is mostly me trying to build something fun. And thats what this is about: I hope you have some fun.

If you like what I do,  visit me on twitter: Dinchensart 
or support me on Ko-Fi: here .

Bitsy Gamemaker by Adam Le Doux  and Pollen8 Palette by Conker
